title: Mercury in Libra
summary: Conversation turns toward balance, fairness, and shared understanding. Decisions weigh multiple perspectives and aesthetics influence preferences. The opportunity is collaborative dialogue that stays honest.

meaning.headline: Thinking seeks harmony without losing perspective.

frames.text: Mercury in Libra emphasizes diplomacy, negotiation, and consideration of multiple sides.
Tone matters: messages land best when they feel respectful and balanced.
Design, aesthetics, and presentation influence choices.
Partnerships and agreements are front of mind.
Seeking balance means avoiding clear stances.

frictions: Smoothing over conflict instead of resolving it
Saying what others want to hear

reusable_lines.text: Balance the conversation: state your view and invite theirs.
Diplomacy works best when it keeps the core truth intact.

forbidden_claims: Claims that avoiding conflict is the safest choice
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can aid negotiation and mutual understanding
